definition: The word "nervös" refers to a state of being characterized by restlessness, anxiety, or unease. It is commonly used to describe a person's emotional or mental state when they are feeling agitated or easily irritated.

examples.german: Sie ist nervös vor ihrem Auftritt.
examples.english: She is nervous before her performance.

examples.german: Er wird immer nervös, wenn er vor Publikum sprechen muss.
examples.english: He always gets nervous when he has to speak in front of an audience.

examples.german: Sie ist nervös, weil sie einen wichtigen Termin hat.
examples.english: She is nervous because she has an important appointment.

examples.german: Er ist nervös, weil er nicht weiß, was passieren wird.
examples.english: He is nervous because he doesn't know what will happen.
